attributes.action: Stop the Health Secretaries ludicrous ideas on the failings of the NHS.
attributes.background: I have worked with in the NHS for the past 23 years. I became unwell at the end of September 2016. I Have had my eyes opened up to the poor service that we are getting as national insurance contributors.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
